data.name: Paper Shakespeare: To Date Or Not To Date? 2: Halloween Edition
data.detailed_description:
Nothing says freedom like dressing up at night!

This DLC includes spookyr outfits for every main character.

TO USE:

1) Install DLC

2) Choose 'Outfits: Spooky' from your Dorm Room.
